name: 304 Stainless Steel Flange 3/4 Inch,Slip On,Flat Welding Flange With Neck,Forged,Raised Face,Class 150,Pipe Fittings For Industry and Engineering
short_description: The flange is made of 304 Stainless steel after forging,which is a common material.It complies with ASME B16.5-2020,class 150.For its dimensions,please check the details.
Slip-On Flange.It has a short neck where the pipe can be slid in from one side of the flange and then welded on both sides,it is suitable for low and medium pressure applications.
Flange selection.When selecting a flange,review the details and measure the dimensions of the part or pipe to which it will be connected.
This slip-on flange is easy to install and it is applied to connect pipes,valves and pumps.It is widely used in the mechanical industry,chemical industry,and so on.
About the use.Before welding,clean the flange and clean the matching pipe or parts as necessary.

name: WEDO 2pcs Stainless Steel Flange Wedge Set, Pipe Fitting Welding Tools,Spreading Flanges Triangle Tool,Rust-proof, Corrosion resistant, Die-forged,Size150*25 * 13mm(6”*1”*1/2”)
short_description: Tools Specification:The Flange Wedge Set includes 2pcs Flange Wedges, Size 150*25*13mm(6”*1”*1/2”). Best materials: Stainless Steel Flange Wedges adopt Stainless Steel 304 as raw materials and the most advanced production technology to achieve High Hardness of HRC40-45.

Design: Stainless Steel Flange Wedges is Die-forged by large friction pressing machine. Artificial mechanics design, comfortable and safety to use. Stainless Steel Flange Wedges is widely used in marine, shipping, petrochemical, industrial, nuclear, having a broad market prospect. Suitable for operation in high magnetic field.

Manufacturing process: Stainless Steel Flange Wedges are die-forged by large friction pressing machine.Stainless Steel Flange Wedges used to level up, moving equipment. Weak Magnetic, suitable for operation in high magnetic field.

Environmentally Friendly: Stainless Steel Spreading Flanges Triangle Tools are environmentally friendly, surface without chrome or any other plating. This kind of tools are corrosion-resistant, high-strength, not easy to break or rust, and have good ductility and toughness. be used in harsh environment (including antacid or alkali environment).

Service: WEDO TOOLS has been highly praised by our new and old customers because of our user-friendly design concept, continuous improvement of excellent quality and after-sales services. WEDO TOOLS have been exported to more than 100 countries and regions. To enhance customers’ satisfaction, we set up service centers in Germany, Russia, South Korea, Singapore, Canada, the United States, the united Arab emirates, in order to provide timely after-sales service.

name: GeilSpace Stainless Steel Floor Flange, 304 Pipe Flange Fitting for Plumbing, Industrial Use, Furniture DIY – Pipe Fittings, Rust-Resistant, Set of 2 (3/4")
short_description: Size - Floor Flange fits standard 3/4" threaded pipes and fittings, set of 2.
Premium Stainless Steel Construction - Crafted from high-quality 304 stainless steel, this floor flange resists rust, corrosion, and tarnishing even in humid or outdoor environments.

Easy Installation & Versatile Compatibility - Pre-drilled mounting holes and a smooth inner diameter ensure quick attachment to pipes and secure fastening to floors or walls. Perfect for DIY projects requiring minimal tools.
Multi-Purpose Applications - Use indoors or outdoors for stair railings, machinery mounting, furniture framing, or plumbing systems. Suitable for residential, commercial, and workshop environments.
Industry Standard Quality Assurance - Precision-machined to meet strict manufacturing standards. Includes a brushed finish to reduce visible scratches and maintain a clean aesthetic over time.

name: M12x1.75mm DIN6926 Flange Nylon Lock Nuts 10 Pack 304 Stainless Steel Hex Locknuts Full Thread for Industrial Construction Fasteners
short_description: [DIMENSIONS] Type: flange nuts; Standard: DIN6926; Material: 18-8 (A2, 304) Stainless Steel; Thread diameter: 12mm / 0.472"; Thread pitch: 1.75mm / 0.069"; Quantity: 10 pcs.

[MATERIAL] 100% Made of high quality 304 stainless steel (also known as 18-8 or A2 stainless steel), they have good corrosion resistance, rust resistance and high hardness, which provides a longer service life, can be used indoor and outdoor, even in humid environment.
[FEATURE] Flange works like a washer to distribute the load. With a nylon insert, these lock nuts greatly reduce loosening under vibrations and torque.
[APPLICATION] Easy installation for mild vibration environment. Can be used in machinery, electrical appliances, automobile, shipbuilding and etc.
[NOTE] Small parts included, please keep away from children and pets.
